welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.content: # About Cosmicord.js is a powerful and intuitive Lavalink wrapper designed to simplify the process of integrating Lavalink into your Node.js applications. ![Cosmicord.js](https://discord.com/api/guilds/1116001022167490642/widget.png?style=banner2) # Documentation You can find the documentation [here](https://cosmicordjs.now.sh). # Installation ```sh npm install cosmicord.js ``` or if you use yarn ```sh yarn add cosmicord.js ``` # Help If you don't understand something in the documentation, you are experiencing problems, or you just need a gentle nudge in the right direction, please join our [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pSKW5cWNtS).

get-started.name: Get Started
